name: Endless Runner (HoneyTbone)
description:
ENDLESS RUNNER!!!

You Can push the button at the bottom right to go to full screen!

A fun and exciting 2d Endless Runner, where you play as a cute green monster avoiding obstacles as he makes his way through a nasty cave!

This is the first of many games I wish to publish to Itch.io

Tell me what you think, and don't forget to post your score in the comments.

Bet you can't beat my high score of 2,750

How To Play: 

Up Arrow or W to move up    -     Down Arrow or S to move down

Values of Items

Health pickup = 1 health                Star Pickup = 15 points

SpikeBall = 1 damage            BiggerSpikeBall = 2 damage            Missile = 3 damage

When obstacles pass by you, you will gain points for each certain obstacle.

SpikeBall = 1 point           BiggerSpikeBall = 2 points           Missile = 3 points
